snippet: After Deadline's relentless cliché watch continues, thanks to Patrick LaForge and some other sharp-eyed colleagues. In deadline haste, sometimes it's hard to avoid falling back on a familiar stockpile of words and phrases. But let's stay alert and...
abstract: After Deadline's relentless cliché watch continues, thanks to Patrick LaForge and some other sharp-eyed colleagues. In deadline haste, sometimes it's hard to avoid falling back on a familiar stockpile of words and phrases. But let's stay alert and not write on autopilot. And copy editors - help those harried writers out.

headline.main: More Words We Love Too Much
